#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    map<string,int> arr;
    arr["C"]=0;;
    arr["c"]=1;
    arr["D"]=2;
    arr["d"]=3;
    arr["E"]=4;
    arr["F"]=5;
    arr["f"]=6;
    arr["G"]=7;
    arr["g"]=8;
    arr["A"]=9;
    arr["B"]=10;
    arr["S"]=11;
    while(T--){
    string a,b,c;
    cin>>a>>b>>c;
    int res1=arr[b]-arr[a];
    int res2=arr[c]-arr[b];
    if(res1<0)
        res1+=12;
    if(res2<0)
        res2+=12;
    if(res1==4&&res2==3)
        cout<<"Major"<<endl;
    else if(res1==3&&res2==4)
        cout<<"Minor"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
